markdownRemark.html:
This post is part of an ongoing series in which I document my journey through the COVID-19 quarantine. See Day 1 for full context.

Quick update

Kept on watching a documentary about WWII. Seems like the quarantine will be extended for another 2 weeks. After almost 2 months, I’m starting to feel a bit of claustrophobia already. I feel like I need some time off - I love solitude and lock down but 2 months starts to feel like a little bit too much now.
